General.Name: Cybergun SA
General.Description: Cybergun S.A. manufactures and distributes replica weapons, light machine guns, and associated accessories worldwide. It also offers gun practice systems, air guns, soft air guns, firearms, chronograph, and BBs products, as well as various accessories, including green gas, CO2, chargers, batteries, tactical goggles and masks, vests, paracord slings, mag pouches, slings and shotgun accessories, COBRA and EVO stalkers, strobe marker lights, anti-fog spray and holsters, gun cases, bags and bipods, mounts, rails and grips, silencers and adapters, dot sights, wood grips, scopes, GPB, mini rigs, lasers and flashlights, grenades, and targets. The company provides its products under the ARCHON FIREARMS, CYBERGUN, CANiK, COLT, KAHR ARMS, FAMAS, DESERT EAGLE, FN HERSTAL, GLOCK, KALASHNIKOV, MAUSER, SCHMEISSER, SWISS ARMS, and THOMPSON brands. The company was formerly known as Les 3 Pylônes and changed its name to Cybergun S.A. in 1999. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Suresnes, France.

7.Name: Renaud  Calixte
7.Title: Head of Operations of Palco Marketing & SOFTAIR USA
